name: Parkour Runner Legacy
description:
This is the remaining version of Parkour Runner Legacy. PRL will no longer be updated as the normal PR has been moved to a new unity project.

Why choose to move?

Apparently, when unity upgrades to a new editor, my scripts had more errors and in the last editor, I only had just 1 error. When downgrading, the text in the UI got completely broken, so I just decided it's best to move to a new unity project.

What will come in the full game?

Better graphics and FOR SURE more levels and multiplayer support

Do I have to pay for this and the full game?

Let me get this straight, PRL, PR, and all of my other games will ALWAYS be free.

If the legacy version is broken, how do you have a normal copy of the game?

I basically built (exported) it before I moved to a new project

Will the tutorial make it in the full game?

Maybe, we just need to make changes to it so that it's easier and we don't chuck everything at once to the player.

All helpful tips and feedback will be accepted in the comments section.
